use this to say that something is normal and not surprising
Naturally, you’ll want to discuss this with your wife.
Naturally enough, she wanted her child to grow up fit and strong.
use this to say ‘yes’ when you agree with someone or when you think the person who asked the question should know that your reply will be ‘yes’
in a way that is the result of nature, not of someone’s actions
Speaking in public seems to come quite naturally to her.
in a relaxed manner without trying to look or sound different from usual
Just speak naturally and pretend the microphone isn’t there.
